name: Data Mining Protection
description: Employ [Assignment: organization-defined data mining prevention and detection techniques] for [Assignment: organization-defined data storage objects] to detect and protect against unauthorized data mining.
supplemental_guidance: Data storage objects include database records and database fields. Sensitive information can be extracted from data warehouses, databases, and data storage objects through data mining. Data mining prevention and detection techniques include limiting the types of responses provided to database queries, limiting the number or frequency of database queries to increase the work factor needed to determine the contents of databases, and notifying organizational personnel when atypical database queries or accesses occur.

rev5.name: Data Mining Protection
rev5.description: Employ [Assignment: organization-defined data mining prevention and detection techniques] for [Assignment: organization-defined data storage objects] to detect and protect against unauthorized data mining.
rev5.discussion: Data storage objects include database records and database fields. Sensitive information can be extracted from data warehouses, databases, and data storage objects through data mining. Data mining prevention and detection techniques include limiting the types of responses provided to database queries, limiting the number or frequency of database queries to increase the work factor needed to determine the contents of databases, and notifying organizational personnel when atypical database queries or accesses occur.

attack_techniques.name: Data from Local System
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections—including query result limiting, data masking, and access pattern monitoring—restrict adversary collection from local data stores by preventing bulk data extraction and flagging anomalous access.

attack_techniques.name: Data from Removable Media
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections that enforce data classification and restrict bulk data transfer to removable media limit adversary collection by preventing wholesale data extraction from organizational storage to portable devices.

attack_techniques.name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining prevention controls that limit query result sizes and monitor data access patterns can detect and block exfiltration staging over C2 channels by identifying anomalous data aggregation activities.

attack_techniques.name: Exfiltration Over Alternative Protocol
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections that restrict bulk data extraction and monitor database query patterns enable detection of exfiltration preparation by flagging data aggregation that precedes transfer over alternative protocols.

attack_techniques.name: Exfiltration Over Physical Medium
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining prevention that restricts bulk data queries and enforces data classification controls limits the volume of sensitive data adversaries can stage for exfiltration over physical media.

attack_techniques.name: Data from Information Repositories
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections on information repositories—including access rate limiting, query restrictions, and download monitoring—directly prevent adversary bulk data collection from organizational knowledge bases.

attack_techniques.name: Exfiltration Over Web Service
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining prevention controls that limit data export volumes and monitor for systematic data extraction enable detection and blocking of data staging for exfiltration over web service channels.

attack_techniques.name: Exfiltration Over Asymmetric Encrypted Non-C2 Protocol
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections restricting bulk data extraction rates and volumes limit the amount of data adversaries can stage for exfiltration over asymmetric encrypted non-C2 protocol channels.

attack_techniques.name: Exfiltration Over Unencrypted Non-C2 Protocol
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining prevention controls that monitor and limit data aggregation activities restrict adversary ability to collect and stage data for exfiltration over unencrypted non-C2 protocol channels.

attack_techniques.name: Exfiltration over USB
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections enforcing data classification and transfer volume restrictions prevent adversary bulk data collection prior to USB exfiltration by limiting the data that can be aggregated for physical transfer.

attack_techniques.name: Confluence
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections on Confluence—including search result limiting, export restrictions, and access frequency monitoring—prevent adversary systematic extraction of organizational knowledge base content.

attack_techniques.name: Sharepoint
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections on SharePoint—including download throttling, bulk export blocking, and access pattern monitoring—prevent adversary systematic collection of organizational documents and data.

attack_techniques.name: Customer Relationship Management Software
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections on CRM systems—including report export restrictions, API rate limiting, and query result size caps—prevent adversary extraction of customer relationship data at scale.

attack_techniques.name: Messaging Applications
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections on messaging applications—including message export restrictions, API rate limiting, and search result capping—prevent adversary bulk extraction of sensitive organizational communications.

attack_techniques.name: Container API
attack_techniques.mapping_rationale: Data mining protections on container APIs—including rate limiting, response filtering, and access monitoring—prevent adversary systematic extraction of credentials and secrets through container metadata queries.

metadata.review_notes: Generated from NIST SP 800-53 Rev 5 with compliance mappings from framework-coverage data
